name: Jin Tae Kwak
content: QuIIL | Korea University Large-scale AI Models & Medicine LLMs & VLMs for medical image analysis Hardware-aware Efficient AI Integrated design of AI model and neural processing unit architecture Domain Invariant AI Domain-shift resistant representation learning Digital and computational pathology Automated analysis and interpretation of large-scale tissue images Brain Imaging & AI AI for brain imaging generation and analysis Quantitative Imaging & Informatics Laboratory pursues excellence and integrity in research and education. Through the computational techniques and knowledge, we dare to challenge and resolve real-world problems. The primary focus of our research is to develop the cutting-edge artificial intelligence and deep learning techniques for a wide range of data and applications. QuIIL is looking for enthusiastic & talented graduate students and post-docs. Prospective graduate students and post-docs are encouraged to contact Prof. Kwak via email.
